author: liyin
msg: [0.89-fb] [HBASE-7179] make the open/close thread pools to be daemon threads
Author: aaiyer
Summary:
It looks like a Regionserver shutdown sometimes takes
30 sec more than what it should.
This is because we are waiting for the region open/close threads, and
the store open/close threads to die out (which takes 30sec).
We should not need to wait for these threads. Marking them as Daemon
will potentially save 30 sec during shutdown/restart.
Test Plan:
will push out to dev cluster and do a
hadoopctl restart regionserver
Reviewers: kannan, liyintang
Reviewed By: liyintang
CC: hbase-eng@, hbase-prodeng@
Differential Revision: https://phabricator.fb.com/D634093
